recipesJson.name: Ganache Delight
recipesJson.author: VapeNTech
recipesJson.description: All relevant flavor notes can be found here:  https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/7cxt0n/ganache_delight/

reviews.text: Delicious, I love chocolate and this is one of the best I've tried.
First chocolate vape I enjoyed.  I don't really like nutty vapes, but here I don't find it offensive.  Good job!
This is really good. Tastes exactly as described in reddit notes. Rich, creamy, sweet and chocolatey with a touch of hazelnut. Recipe is very well done.
